amendment.description: An amendment numbered 74 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service and the Assistant Administrator for Fisheries of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, from taking any action to finalize, implement, or enforce the Administration's Proposed ESA rules. These include bringing back the blanket 4(d) rule, which extends endangered protections to threatened species, proposes to expand the listing and habitat designations under the ESA, and reverses the simplified interagency consultation process.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service and the Assistant Administrator for Fisheries of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration from taking any action to finalize, implement, or enforce the Administration's proposed Endangered Species Act rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 212 (Roll no. 575).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 212 (Roll no. 575).
